title: SDXL LoRA Training (Simpsons)
name: sdxl-lora-simpsons
setup: uv pip install diffusers[torch] transformers accelerate peft bitsandbytes torchvision wandb pandas requests pyarrow transformerlab
description: Fine-tune Stable Diffusion XL (SDXL) on the Simpsons dataset using LoRA. Loads data directly via Pandas/Parquet to avoid library conflicts.
